I have a fix but I want to test it in Eclipse.  Does it happen every time?  Are the set of steps the same as the ones on the Mac?

Ok, I can release the code now and you can remove your fix, test it and let me know.  Do you have any other ideas?  I can make a simple case fail and hope that this is the same case you are seeing.  Let me know.
OK, I will test your fix when released.
Ok, the code is released but I won't close the bug until it WORKSFORYOU.
Did you try GTK and Motif?  Given that this pattern fails, it might fail there too.  I don't have the code that causes it or I'd try it myself.
